data.name: Dbook Platform
data.description:
Dbook Platform hopes to create a decentralized business operation, where each token
holder has a voice on how the business should be conducted and run, as well as receiving
dividends and profit-sharing from the business itself. Dbook Platform is a distributed platform owned by all $DBK token holders, and so, every
token holder should have a say in the future direction of Dbook Platform.

***Our Vision



1. To create a convenient, yet private and discreet gaming experience for our players — a
leader in decentralized gaming and prediction platform that’s inclusive for all, including users who may not be familiar with cryptocurrency.

2. To give back to society, by nurturing minds and educating the mass public — Contributing to
society, and influencing the community positively with decentralization.




*** DBK token


1. $DBK is our native token in DbookDAO. There will only ever be 10,000,000 $DBK.

2. $DBK token will be used by holders, specifically members of DbookDAO, to claim for their share of profits generated by Dbook Operations.

3. Holding $DBK tokens will also grant DAO members voting power.

4. Team allocations will be locked for 3 years. 

5. 25% of total supply will be released over 10 years to reward platform contributors, from staking, farming, to bounty hunting! 




***Dbook Platform - Activities

Dbook Platform will be creating games similar to those in casinos on Telegram. Users who wish to enjoy our games will need to deposit USDT or any other supported stablecoins in order to place a wager. Profits generated from such activities will be used to sustain the operations of the team, and up to 70% will also be distributed to DbookDAO and fund 'profit distribution pool'. $DBK holders can choose to stake their $DBK tokens to claim for those profits. The remaining 30% will be allocated for donations and contributions to charitable causes chosen by DbookDAO.
